text: The 2012 All Thailand Golf Tour is the 14th season of the All Thailand Golf Tour, the main professional golf tour in Thailand since it was established in 1999. ==Tournament results== The table below shows the 2012 schedule. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%" !Date !! Tournament !! Location !! Prize money men (฿) !! Prize money women (฿) !! Men's winner !! Women's winner |- | 13 May || Singha Pattaya Open || Burapha Golf Club (D-B) || align=right|2,000,000 || align=right|100,000 || Prom Meesawat || Tiranan Yoopan |- | 22 Jul || Singha All Thailand Championship || Laem Chabang International Country Club (A-C) || align=right|2,000,000 || align=right|100,000 || Kiradech Aphibarnrat || Jaruporn Palakawong na Ayutthaya |- | 19 Aug || Singha E-San Open || Singha Park Khon Kaen Golf Club || align=right|2,000,000 || align=right|100,000 || Gunn Charoenkul || Parinda Phokan (a) |- | 22 Dec || Singha Classic || Royal Hills Golf Resort & Spa || align=right|2,000,000 || align=right|100,000 || Varan Israbhakdi || Wichanee Meechai |- | 3 Feb 2013 || Singha Masters || Santiburi Country Club Chiang Rai || align=right|4,000,000 || align=right|200,000 || Kiradech Aphibarnrat || Thidapa Suwannapura |} ==References== Category:All Thailand Golf Tour All Thailand Golf Tour
title: 2012 All Thailand Golf Tour
